mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_MEMBER(EMAIL, NAME, LOGIN_ID, PWD) VALUES (#{email},#{name},#{loginId}, #{pwd})
mapper.select: SELECT ID, PWD FROM TBL_MEMBER WHERE LOGIN_ID=#{loginId}

SELECT TC.CART_ID,TP.PRODUCT_ID,TI.IMAGE_ORIGINAL_NAME,TP.PRODUCT_NAME,TP.PRODUCT_PRICE,TC.CART_QUANTITY,TP.PRODUCT_STOCK FROM TBL_CART TC INNER JOIN TBL_PRODUCT TP on TP.PRODUCT_ID = TC.PRODUCT_ID INNER JOIN TBL_IMAGES TI on TP.PRODUCT_ID = TI.REFERENCE_ID WHERE TC.MEMBER_ID =#{memberId} AND TI.MAIN_IMAGE = 'Y'
